faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.content: Put your investing ideas into action with full range of investments. Enjoy real benefits and rewards on your accrue investing.

leftfaq.title: How to Invest?
leftfaq.content: To invest with us, simply follow these steps: (1) Register your account, (2) Login securely, (3) Deposit funds, (4) Wait for confirmation, and (5) Enjoy your gains.

leftfaq.title: How much gains do we provide?
leftfaq.content: We provide a 3% gain per month, starting from the day you make a successful deposit.

leftfaq.title: How long does it takes the deposit to reflect in my account?
leftfaq.content: Your balance will be updated within 24Hrs of your deposit.

leftfaq.title: How to deposit ?
leftfaq.content: Pay the mentioned amount to the provided scanner and our team will confirm your deposit within 24Hrs.

rightfaq.title: Can i deposit in middle of the month?
rightfaq.content: No. Deposit button will be disabled after your first deposit. On rest of the days of the month, expect the day of your first time deposit + 5 Days

rightfaq.title: Can i withdraw my amount anytime i want?
rightfaq.content: Yes. you can withdraw your money whenever you wish to but remember if you break the investment period contract you will be charged 5% of your current balance

rightfaq.title: : How long will it take for the money to be credited to my account after a withdrawal
rightfaq.content: The money will be credited to your account within 24 hours after a successful withdrawal request.
